description: ThaiTune is a program that allows users to contribute their knowledge of Traditional Thai Melodies by adding songs they know, while also providing an opportunity to discover and learn new melodies from the existing database.
uploadDescription: ThaiTune allows you to upload your favorite Thai Traditional Songs, whilst accessing other songs uploaded by users.
feature1Desc: Create and edit Thai traditional music scores with our intuitive editor
feature2Desc: Contribute to the community by sharing your musical expertise
feature3Desc: Discover and learn new traditional Thai melodies from our growing collection
editorDescription: A powerful yet easy-to-use editor designed specifically for Thai traditional music
manageAccountDescription: Manage your account and profile settings.
settingsUpdatedSuccess: Your settings have been updated successfully.

database.title: Explore Our Thai Music Database
database.description: Discover thousands of traditional Thai melodies, contributed by musicians and scholars from around the world. Our comprehensive database preserves and shares the rich heritage of Thai music.
database.featuresDescription: Our database is designed to make discovering and learning Thai music intuitive and comprehensive
database.advancedSearchDesc: Search by song title, composer, region, instrument, or musical style. Our intelligent search helps you find exactly what you're looking for.
database.smartFilteringDesc: Filter songs by difficulty level, time period, regional origin, and musical characteristics to find pieces that match your interests.
database.communityContributionsDesc: Musicians and scholars worldwide contribute their knowledge, ensuring our database grows with authentic traditional melodies.
database.multipleFormatsDesc: Download sheet music in various formats including PDF, MusicXML, and MIDI for use with your favorite music software.
database.qualityAssuranceDesc: All submissions are reviewed by music experts to ensure accuracy and authenticity of traditional Thai musical notation.
database.historicalContextDesc: Each song includes historical background, cultural significance, and performance notes to enrich your understanding.
database.statsDescription: Growing collection of Thai musical heritage
database.howItWorksDescription: Simple steps to explore and contribute to Thai musical heritage
database.step1Description: Use our advanced search and filtering tools to discover traditional Thai songs by region, style, or instrument.
database.step2Description: Access sheet music, audio recordings, and cultural context to deepen your understanding of each piece.
database.step3Description: Add your own knowledge of traditional Thai melodies to help preserve this musical heritage for future generations.
database.ctaDescription: Join thousands of musicians and music lovers in preserving and learning traditional Thai music. Your contribution helps keep this beautiful musical tradition alive.

footer.description: ThaiTune helps musicians learn, create, and share traditional Thai music with a modern platform designed to preserve cultural heritage.
